BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.head
BlackBox.type: head :: Vec (n + 1) a -> a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.tail
BlackBox.type: tail :: Vec (n + 1) a -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.last
BlackBox.type: Vec (n + 1) a -> a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.init
BlackBox.type: Vec (n + 1) a -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.select
BlackBox.type:
select :: (CmpNat (i + s) (s * n) ~ GT) -- ARG[0]
        => SNat f                        -- ARG[1]
        -> SNat s                        -- ARG[2]
        -> SNat n                        -- ARG[3]
        -> Vec i a                       -- ARG[4]
        -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.++
BlackBox.type: (++) :: Vec n a -> Vec m a -> Vec (n + m) a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.concat
BlackBox.type: concat :: Vec n (Vec m a) -> Vec (n * m) a
BlackBox.templateD:
-- concat begin
~GENSYM[concat][0] : for ~GENSYM[i][1] in ~VAR[vec][0]'range generate
begin~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
~RESULT(~SYM[1] * ~LENGTH[~TYPEL[~TYP[0]]] to ((~SYM[1]+1) * ~LENGTH[~TYPEL[~TYP[0]]]) - 1) <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec][0](~SYM[1]));~ELSE
~RESULT(~SYM[1] * ~LENGTH[~TYPEL[~TYP[0]]] to ((~SYM[1]+1) * ~LENGTH[~TYPEL[~TYP[0]]]) - 1) <= ~VAR[vec][0](~SYM[1]);~FI
end generate;
-- concat end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.splitAt
BlackBox.type: splitAt :: SNat m -> Vec (m + n) a -> (Vec m a, Vec n a)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.unconcat
BlackBox.type:
unconcat :: KnownNat n     -- ARG[0]
          => SNat m         -- ARG[1]
          -> Vec (n * m) a  -- ARG[2]
          -> Vec n (Vec m a)
BlackBox.templateD:
-- unconcat begin
~GENSYM[unconcat][0] : for ~GENSYM[i][2] in ~RESULT'range generate
begin~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
  ~RESULT(~SYM[2]) <= ~TOBV[~VAR[vec][2]((~SYM[2] * ~LIT[1]) to ((~SYM[2] * ~LIT[1]) + ~LIT[1] - 1))][~TYPEL[~TYPO]];~ELSE
  ~RESULT(~SYM[2]) <= ~VAR[vec][2]((~SYM[2] * ~LIT[1]) to ((~SYM[2] * ~LIT[1]) + ~LIT[1] - 1));~FI
end generate;
-- unconcat end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.map
BlackBox.type: map :: (a -> b) -> Vec n a -> Vec n b
BlackBox.templateD:
-- map begin
~GENSYM[map][0] : for ~GENSYM[i][1] in ~RESULT'range generate~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
  signal ~GENSYM[map_in][2]  : ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]];
  signal ~GENSYM[map_out][3] : ~TYPEL[~TYPO];
begin
  ~SYM[2] <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec][1](~SYM[1]));
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~SYM[3]~ ~TYPEL[~TYPO]~
    ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[2]~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]]~
  ~INST
  ~RESULT(~SYM[1]) <= ~TOBV[~SYM[3]][~TYPEL[~TYPO]];
end generate;~ELSE
begin
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM[1])~ ~TYPEL[~TYPO]~
    ~INPUT  <= ~VAR[vec][1](~SYM[1])~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]]~
  ~INST
end generate;~FI
-- map end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.imap
BlackBox.type: imap :: KnownNat n => (Index n -> a -> b) -> Vec n a -> Vec n b

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.zipWith
BlackBox.type: zipWith :: (a -> b -> c) -> Vec n a -> Vec n b -> Vec n c
BlackBox.templateD:
-- zipWith begin
~GENSYM[zipWith][0] : for ~GENSYM[i][1] in ~RESULT'range generate~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
  signal ~GENSYM[zipWith_in1][2] : ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]];
  signal ~GENSYM[zipWith_in2][6] : ~TYPEL[~TYP[2]];
  signal ~GENSYM[zipWith_out][3] : ~TYPEL[~TYPO];
begin
  ~SYM[2] <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec1][1](~SYM[1]));
  ~SYM[6] <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec2][2](~SYM[1]));
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~SYM[3]~ ~TYPEL[~TYPO]~
    ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[2]~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]]~
    ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[6]~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[2]]~
  ~INST
  ~RESULT(~SYM[1]) <= ~TOBV[~SYM[3]][~TYPEL[~TYPO]];
end generate;~ELSE
begin
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM[1])~ ~TYPEL[~TYPO]~
    ~INPUT  <= ~VAR[vec1][1](~SYM[1])~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[1]]~
    ~INPUT  <= ~VAR[vec2][2](~SYM[1])~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[2]]~
  ~INST
end generate;~FI
-- zipWith end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.foldr
BlackBox.type: foldr :: (a -> b -> b) -> b -> Vec n a -> b
BlackBox.templateD:
-- foldr begin~IF ~LENGTH[~TYP[2]] ~THEN
~GENSYM[foldr][0] : block
  type ~GENSYM[foldr_res_type][1] is array (natural range <>) of ~TYP[1];
  signal ~GENSYM[intermediate][2] : ~SYM[1] (0 to ~LENGTH[~TYP[2]]);
begin
  ~SYM[2](~LENGTH[~TYP[2]]) <= ~ARG[1];

  foldr_loop : for ~GENSYM[i][3] in ~VAR[vec][2]'range generate~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
    signal ~GENSYM[foldr_in][4] : ~TYPEL[~TYP[2]];
  begin
    ~SYM[4] <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec][2](~SYM[3]));
    ~INST 0
      ~OUTPUT <= ~SYM[2](~SYM[3])~ ~TYP[1]~
      ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[4]~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[2]]~
      ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[2](~SYM[3]+1)~ ~TYP[1]~
    ~INST
  end generate;~ELSE
  begin
    ~INST 0
      ~OUTPUT <= ~SYM[2](~SYM[3])~ ~TYP[1]~
      ~INPUT  <= ~VAR[vec][2](~SYM[3])~ ~TYPEL[~TYP[2]]~
      ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[2](~SYM[3]+1)~ ~TYP[1]~
    ~INST
  end generate;~FI

  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[2](0);
end block;~ELSE
~RESULT <= ~ARG[1];~FI
-- foldr end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.fold
BlackBox.type: fold :: (a -> a -> a) -> Vec (n+1) a -> a
BlackBox.comment: THIS ONLY WORKS FOR POWER OF TWO LENGTH VECTORS
BlackBox.templateD:
-- fold begin
~GENSYM[fold][0] : block
  -- given a level and a depth, calculate the corresponding index into the
  -- intermediate array
  function ~GENSYM[depth2Index][1] (levels,depth : in natural) return natural is
  begin
    return (2 ** levels - 2 ** depth);
  end function;
~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
  type ~GENSYM[fold_res_type][2] is array(natural range <>) of ~TYPO;
  signal ~GENSYM[intermediate][3] : ~SYM[2](0 to (2*~LENGTH[~TYP[1]])-2);~ELSE
  signal ~SYM[3] : ~TYPM[1](0 to (2*~LENGTH[~TYP[1]])-2);~FI
  constant ~GENSYM[levels][5] : natural := natural (ceil (log2 (real (~LENGTH[~TYP[1]]))));
begin
  -- put input array into the first half of the intermediate array~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
  ~SYM[6] : for ~SYM[7] in ~VAR[vec][1]'range generate
    ~SYM[3](~SYM[7]) <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec][1](~SYM[7]));
  end generate;~ELSE
  ~SYM[3](0 to ~LENGTH[~TYP[1]]-1) <= ~VAR[vec][1];~FI

  -- Create the tree of instantiated components
  ~GENSYM[make_tree][8] : if ~SYM[5] /= 0 generate
    ~GENSYM[tree_depth][9] : for ~GENSYM[d][10] in ~SYM[5]-1 downto 0 generate
      ~GENSYM[tree_depth_loop][11] : for ~GENSYM[i][12] in 0 to (natural(2**~SYM[10]) - 1) generate
        ~INST 0
          ~OUTPUT <= ~SYM[3](~SYM[1](~SYM[5]+1,~SYM[10]+1)+~SYM[12])~ ~TYPO~
          ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[3](~SYM[1](~SYM[5]+1,~SYM[10]+2)+(2*~SYM[12]))~ ~TYPO~
          ~INPUT  <= ~SYM[3](~SYM[1](~SYM[5]+1,~SYM[10]+2)+(2*~SYM[12])+1)~ ~TYPO~
        ~INST
      end generate;
    end generate;
  end generate;

  -- The last element of the intermediate array holds the result
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[3]((2*~LENGTH[~TYP[1]])-2);
end block;
-- fold end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.index_int
BlackBox.type: index_int :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> Int -> a
BlackBox.templateD:
-- index begin
~GENSYM[indexVec][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[vec_index][1] : integer range 0 to ~LIT[0]-1;
begin
  ~SYM[1] <= to_integer(~ARG[2])
  -- pragma translate_off
               mod ~LIT[0]
  -- pragma translate_on
               ;~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
  ~RESULT <= fromSLV(~VAR[vec][1](~SYM[1]));~ELSE
  ~RESULT <= ~VAR[vec][1](~SYM[1]);~FI
end block;
-- index end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.replace_int
BlackBox.type: replace_int :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> Int -> a -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.maxIndex
BlackBox.type: maxIndex :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> Int

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.length
BlackBox.type: length :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> Int

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.replicate
BlackBox.type: replicate :: SNat n -> a -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.transpose
BlackBox.type: transpose :: KnownNat n => Vec m (Vec n a) -> Vec n (Vec m a)
BlackBox.templateD:
-- transpose begin
~GENSYM[transpose_outer][2] : for ~GENSYM[row_index][3] in ~VAR[matrix][1]'range generate
  ~GENSYM[transpose_inner][4] : for ~GENSYM[col_index][5] in ~RESULT'range generate~IF ~VIVADO ~THEN
    ~RESULT(~SYM[5])((~VAR[matrix][1]'length-~SYM[3])*~SIZE[~TYPEL[~TYPEL[~TYPO]]]-1 downto (~VAR[matrix][1]'length-~SYM[3]-1)*~SIZE[~TYPEL[~TYPEL[~TYPO]]]) <= ~VAR[vec][1](~SYM[3])((~RESULT'length-~SYM[5])*~SIZE[~TYPEL[~TYPEL[~TYPO]]]-1 downto (~RESULT'length-~SYM[5]-1)*~SIZE[~TYPEL[~TYPEL[~TYPO]]]);~ELSE
    ~RESULT(~SYM[5])(~SYM[3]) <= ~VAR[matrix][1](~SYM[3])(~SYM[5]);~FI
  end generate;
end generate;
-- transpose end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.reverse
BlackBox.type: reverse :: Vec n a -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.lazyV
BlackBox.type: lazyV :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.concatBitVector#
BlackBox.type:
concatBitVector# :: (KnownNat n,KnownNat m) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
                  => Vec n (BitVector m)     -- ARG[2]
                  -> BitVector (n * m)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.unconcatBitVector#
BlackBox.type:
unconcatBitVector# :: (KnownNat n, KnownNat m) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
                    => BitVector (n * m)        -- ARG[2]
                    -> Vec n (BitVector m)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.rotateLeftS
BlackBox.type: rotateLeftS :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> SNat d -> Vec n a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Sized.Vector.rotateRightS
BlackBox.type: rotateRightS :: KnownNat n => Vec n a -> SNat d -> Vec n a
